name: PyroBot
description: A Simple Telegram Bot written in Python using Pyrogram.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables.

TOKEN.description: Bot Token - Get this value from @BotFather

PREFIX_HANDLER.description: Prefix for bot commands, such as '/' and '!', sperate by spaces

NO_LOAD.description: Plugins you don't want to loaded by bot

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram ID, get by sending /info to @Alita_Robot on Telegram

POETRY_VERSION.description: Settings this will change poetry version. DO NOT CHANGE IF YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOURE DOING

PYTHON_RUNTIME_VERSION.description: Settings this will change the python version. DO NOT CHANGE IF YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOURE DOING
